title: New: Cuushe – I Dreamt About Silence
content:
NB: Not actual artwork.

Well this is pretty special. A gorgeously enticing synth number from Japanese singer Cuushe titled I Dream About Silence marks her first new material in well over three years. Taken from girl / you know that I am here / but the dream EP, it’s a track that snuggles in somewhere betwen Bjork and Sigur Ros, with it’s ethereal nature and complexity of harmony. Check out I Dreamt About Silence below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
